rooms.name: Lobby/Entrance Area
rooms.description: Minimalist entry space with direct access to living area; incorporates natural materials.

rooms.name: Open Living & Dining Space
rooms.description: Central area that merges dining and living spaces with large windows for natural light and cross ventilation; oriented towards the east to catch morning sunlight.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Compact kitchen placed adjacent to dining area with ventilation openings in north and east directions per Vastu recommendations; minimalistic design with natural stone finishes.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Cozy master bedroom on ground floor designed for privacy; located in north-west corner to maintain positive Vastu energy and natural light from south side window.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Compact bathroom attached to the master bedroom with minimal fixtures; includes ventilation for moisture control.

openings.description: Large windows to maximize natural light and cross-ventilation in living areas.
Main entrance door ensuring easy access and maintaining minimalistic aesthetic.

rooms.name: Study/Additional Bedroom
rooms.description: Flexible space on the split-level that can serve as a study or guest bedroom; features large windows for ample daylight.

openings.description: Connecting ground floor to split-level upper floor; designed with open railings for unobstructed view.

rooms.name: Rooftop Terrace
rooms.description: Expansive terrace offering open-air relaxation space; equipped with lightweight pergolas and water features for ambient sound.

openings.description: Provides access from the living area to the rooftop terrace; enhances natural ventilation and offers panoramic views.
